escape-key.description: Sets the action reflected when the Escape key is pressed. Setting to `false` disables closing the dialog via Escape key.

closable.description: Closes the dialog, when a user actions on the accept or cancel button.

mask-closable.description: Closes the dialog, when the dialog scrim is clicked.

reset-scroll.description: Reset scroll bar, when the dialog is closed.

fullscreen.description: Styles a full-screen dialog for mobile/small-screen devices.
